summary: Siberia. Late autumn. In taiga, in the deserted village there lives an old man Ivan & his seven-year-old grandson Leshia. A pack of feral dogs devours everything alive in the neighborhood. ... See full summary Â»
cast: Pyotr Zaychenko|Mikhail Protsko|Sergey Novikov|Lidiya Bayrashevskaya|Sonya Ross|Nikolay Kozak|Maksim Emelyanov|Sergey Puskepalis|Yuriy Gumirov|Sergey Tsepov|Juris Laucinsh|Vyacheslav Kovalev|Marianna Shults|Olga Kuzmina|Sofiya Skurikhina|Stefaniya Skurikhina
title: Sibir. Monamur
